entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and after midnight. Clearing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
